meanings.definition: Feel sad, repentant, or disappointed over (something that has happened or been done, especially a loss or missed opportunity)
meanings.sent1: She regretted not studying for the test.
meanings.sent2: He regretted missing the bus to work.
meanings.sent3: The cat regretted knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The tree regretted losing its leaves in winter.
meanings.sent5: The child regretted breaking the toy beyond repair.

meanings.definition: Express disappointment over (something that one has done or failed to do)
meanings.sent1: They regretted not attending the party.
meanings.sent2: She regretted not calling her friend on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The clown regretted dropping the pie on his face.
meanings.sent4: The student regretted spilling ink on the assignment.
meanings.sent5: He regretted forgetting his lines during the play.
